question4
elements.html:
I had to talk them through - Able to perform some tasks but requires repeated directions

I needed to prompt - Demonstrates some independence, but requires intermittent prompting

I needed to be there just in case - Independence but needs assistance with nuances of certain patients and/or situations

I didn't need to be there - Can safely manage a similar or more complex case, ready for independent practice
